issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
When testing the pull request for https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/1341 I noticed this output to the console "'and' is not recognized as an internal or external command,"

Scons still built the sdk successfully

Steps to reproduce:
1. Run scons on a Windows machine
2. Make sure to lock the scroll bar of the command prompt
3. Near the very beginning of the output you should see the output I listed.

Expected behavior:
The output is not shown

Actual behavior:
The output is shown
fields.summary: Android : When running scons, this was output in the console "'and' is not recognized as an internal or external command,"
fields.environment:
Windows 7 and XP
Mobile SDK 1.9.0 (allen's branch from https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/1341)

comments.body: Scons has been deprecated and replaced with a Node.js-based build system.
Closing ticket as the issue won't fix.
